Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Triangular-shaped cup with a rounded base and a simple lip; an unusual type of vessel. The outside surface is brown and appears to have been covered with a red slip, the gloss of which has almost entirely disappeared. This surface was simply polished, whereas the inside was heavily burnished horizontally, the gloss of which has faded a lot.
